languages.text: "Знаешь, а в этом что-то есть — стоять бок о бок, на страже Лекса. По-моему, мы отлично сработались, а?"
"You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, а в этом что-то есть — стоять бок о бок, на страже Лекса. По-моему, мы отлично сработались, а?"

traits.locale_text: "You know, I have rather enjoyed upholding the law. You and I make a good team, don't you think?"
"You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"
"You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"
"You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"
"You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"
"You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"
"You know, I have rather enjoyed upholding the law. You and I make a good team, no?"

languages.text: «¿Sabe? Todo esto tiene cierto atractivo. Luchar espalda contra espalda y preservar la Lex. Diría que formamos buen equipo, ¿no cree?».
languages.original_text: "You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe? Todo esto tiene cierto atractivo. Luchar espalda contra espalda y preservar la Lex. Diría que formamos buen equipo, ¿no cree?».
«¿Sabe? Me ha gustado esta experiencia de salvaguardar la ley. Hacemos buen equipo, ¿no le parece?».
«¿Sabe? Me ha gustado esta experiencia de salvaguardar la ley. Hacemos buen equipo, ¿no le parece?».

languages.text: “老实说，这件事还挺有意思的。咱们并肩作战，一起维护帝国律法。我觉得咱俩这对搭档还不赖，你觉得呢？”
languages.original_text: "You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"

traits.locale_text: “老实说，这件事还挺有意思的。咱们并肩作战，一起维护帝国律法。我觉得咱俩这对搭档还不赖，你觉得呢？”
“老实说，我还挺喜欢维护法律的。咱们两个配合得相当不错，是吧？”
“老实说，我还挺喜欢维护法律的。咱们两个配合得相当不错，是吧？”

languages.text: « Tout ceci est assez plaisant... Je crois que j'aime passer du temps avec vous à défendre la Lex. Nous formons une bonne équipe, vous et moi, vous ne trouvez pas ? »
languages.original_text: "You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout ceci est assez plaisant... Je crois que j'aime passer du temps avec vous à défendre la Lex. Nous formons une bonne équipe, vous et moi, vous ne trouvez pas ? »
« Ce fut un plaisir pour moi que d'appliquer la loi. Nous formons une bonne équipe, vous et moi, vous ne trouvez pas ? »
« Ce fut un plaisir pour moi que d'appliquer la loi. Nous formons une bonne équipe, vous et moi, vous ne trouvez pas ? »

languages.text: 「なあ、こうして肩を並べてレックスを守るのも、なかなか悪くないだろう？君と{mf|俺|私}は、いいコンビになれると思わないか？」
languages.original_text: "You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"

traits.locale_text: 「なあ、こうして肩を並べてレックスを守るのも、なかなか悪くないだろう？君と{mf|俺|私}は、いいコンビになれると思わないか？」
「{mf|俺|私}は法律を守ることをかなり楽しんでいる。君と{mf|俺|私}はいいチームだ、そう思わないか？」
「{mf|俺|私}は法律を守ることをかなり楽しんでいる。君と{mf|俺|私}はいいチームだ、そう思わないか？」

languages.text: "Bu işin de belli bir çekiciliği varmış. Omuz omuza mücadele etmek, Lex'i korumak... İyi bir takım olmadık mı, ne dersin?"
languages.original_text: "You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu işin de belli bir çekiciliği varmış. Omuz omuza mücadele etmek, Lex'i korumak... İyi bir takım olmadık mı, ne dersin?"
"Kanunları uygulama çok hoşuma gitti. Sizinle iyi bir takım olmadık mı, ne dersin?"
"Kanunları uygulama çok hoşuma gitti. Sizinle iyi bir takım olmadık mı, ne dersin?"

languages.text: "Ihr wisst, das Ganze hier birgt einen gewissen Reiz ... Seite an Seite das Lex zu wahren. Ich würde sagen, wir beide sind ein gutes Team, oder?"
languages.original_text: "You know, there is a certain appeal to all this — standing side by side, upholding the Lex. I would say you and I make a good team, no?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst, das Ganze hier birgt einen gewissen Reiz ... Seite an Seite das Lex zu wahren. Ich würde sagen, wir beide sind ein gutes Team, oder?"
"Es hat Spaß gemacht, für das Gesetz einzutreten. Wir beide sind ein gutes Team, oder?"
